thread.title: Amazing hotel will only stay here
thread.title_full: Amazing hotel will only stay here - Review of Pullman Paris Centre - Bercy, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jefferyh212
title: Amazing hotel will only stay here
text: Staff was great. They went above and beyond. We were in Paris to memorialize my friend's mom. Hotel aided us in giving her a beautiful tribute. The room was great and the room service food amazing. The hotel restaraunt for breakfast was good. Great Location! Beatriz ,the guest relations manager was the best staff member of any hotel I've stayed at. Love her! Give her a raise.
